comment: Whites have two choices: (1) Stand up and advocate for our racial interests, as all other races do; or (2) do nothing and go extinct. In order to survive long-term, we Whites will need our own ethno-states.
amr:
# ::snt Whites have two choices: (1) Stand up and advocate for our racial interests, as all other races do; or (2) do nothing and go extinct. In order to survive long-term, we Whites will need our own ethno-states.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (w / white-02))
            :ARG1 (c / choose-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (s / stand-up-07
                              :li 1
                              :ARG1 p)
                        :op2 (a / advocate-01
                              :li 2
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (ii / interest-01
                                    :ARG1 p
                                    :ARG2 (r / race)))
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                              :ARG2 (d / do-02
                                    :ARG0 (r3 / race
                                          :mod (o2 / other)
                                          :mod (a2 / all))
                                    :ARG1 (n / nothing))))
                  :op2 (g / go-08
                        :li 2
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (e / extinct))))
      :snt2 (n2 / need-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02))
            :ARG1 (s2 / state
                  :mod (e2 / ethno)
                  :poss p2)
            :purpose (s3 / survive-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (l / long-03))))

comment: Using the term "c---" pejoratively is so offensive that it should be avoided in intelligent discourse.

                  :mod (p / pejorative)))
      :ARG2 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 u)
      :ARG3 (s / so)
      :ARG6 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (a / avoid-01
                  :ARG1 u
                  :location (d / discourse-01

comment: Avoid using sexually vulgar terms when referring to the female gender.
amr:

(a / avoid-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01

            :time (r / refer-01

comment: Using the word 'cunt' is offensive as its a direct attack to someone based on their gender. Refrain from such words.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :mod (c / cunt)))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / attack-01
                        :ARG1 (s / someone
                              :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                                    :ARG2 (g / gender
                                          :poss s)))
                        :ARG1-of (d / direct-02))))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (w2 / word
                  :mod (s2 / such))))
